channel.title: Scrum Agile BurnDown on Oliver Wehrens
channel.description: Recent content in Scrum Agile BurnDown on Oliver Wehrens

item.title: How to get your developers to pay more attention to the burn down chart (and have fun)
item.description: For the last couple of month our scrum master always drew our daily burn down chart. Nice and fine and it always happened automagically. It came to the point that we (the developers) only occasionally paid attention to it (a little less then we should). One day our scrum master stopped doing it and forced us to do by ourselves. While it seemed a bit strange at first it turns out it was a brilliant idea.
